member.name: F:Microsoft.Isam.Esent.Collections.Generic.PersistentDictionary`2.instance
member.summary: The ESENT instance this dictionary uses. An Instance object inherits from SafeHandle so this instance will be (eventually) terminated even if the dictionary isn't disposed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Isam.Esent.Collections.Generic.PersistentDictionary`2.updateLocks
member.summary: An update lock should be taken when the Dictionary is being updated. Read operations can proceed without any locks (the cursor cache has its own lock to control access to the cursors). There are multiple update locks, which allows multiple writers. When updating a key take the lock which maps to key.GetHashCode() % updateLocks.Length.
